creator: MBSi Corp.
descriptionHtml:
With the RCM mobile app, drivers are armed real-time repossession assignment information. Having case data at your fingertips helps agents mitigate risk by avoiding wrongful repossessions.

RCM mapping allows drivers to easily scan custom icons to efficiently run addresses, provide one-tap updates and recover more units. Quickly create and store filters to drill your map down into what is important to your agency. Filters can also be managed at the admin level and set for field agents. After marking On Hook, agents can go through the asset recovery process when it's safe and convenient. Each asset recovery form captures condition information and photos to easily create a Condition Report that can be reviewed and submitted to the client.

With RCM, you can:
• Real-time case information and addresses
• Quickly search your map
• “Favorite” cases to quickly find cases
• Filter cases to efficiently run addresses
• Custom icons available
• One-tap quick updates
• Auto generated geo-updates
• Work your To Do list to capture quick condition reports of recovered units

For help with RCM, our team is available 24/7. You can submit a request using Contact Us or through out website https://mbsicorp.com/contact/

descriptionShort: Case mapping with RCM! RCM integrates with RecoveryConnect® and MRS web apps.
title: RCM

creator: MBSi Corp.
descriptionHtml:
The RCM mobile app equips recovery agency drivers with real-time repossession assignment data and updates.

Assigned cases will display on a map and/or list view depending on your subscription type. Filters can be created to prioritize cases. Agents can quickly and efficiently run addresses, make case updates, and mark collateral as recovered.

After marking a collateral On-Hook and the field agent has relocated to a safe spot, they can complete the asset recovery process including condition information and photos for the client’s Condition Report.

RCM enables drivers to:
• Search & view case details and make updates in real-time
• Mitigate risk of wrongful repossessions due to immediate data flow
• View all cases on the map
• Receive turn-by-turn navigation using Google, Apple, or Waze
• Mark collateral On-Hook
• Click-to-call police for quick recovery reporting
• Create custom filters
• View mapped cases using personalized icons

For help with RCM, our team is available 24/7. You can submit a request using Contact Us or through out website https://mbsicorp.com/contact/

creator: MBSi Corp.
descriptionHtml:
The RCM mobile app equips recovery agency drivers with real-time repossession assignment data and updates.

Assigned cases will display on a map and/or list view depending on your subscription type. Filters can be created to prioritize cases. Agents can quickly and efficiently run addresses, make case updates, and mark collateral as recovered.

After marking a collateral On-Hook and the field agent has relocated to a safe spot, they can complete the asset recovery process including condition information and photos for the client’s Condition Report.

RCM enables drivers to:
• Search & view case details and make updates in real-time
• Mitigate risk of wrongful repossessions due to immediate data flow
• View all cases on the map
• Receive turn-by-turn navigation using Google, Apple, or Waze
• Mark collateral On-Hook
• Click-to-call police for quick recovery reporting
• Create custom filters
• View mapped cases using personalized icons

For help with RCM, our team is available 24/7. You can submit a request using Contact Us or through out website https://mbsicorp.com/contact/

descriptionShort: Case mapping with RCM! RCM integrates with RecoveryConnect® and MRS web apps.
title: RCM

creator: MBSi Corp.
descriptionHtml:
Equip your field agents with real-time repossession assignment information with RCM. Having case data at your fingertips helps agents mitigate risk by avoiding wrongful repossessions and quickly updating the status of the unit to On Hook. After marking On Hook, agents can go through the asset recovery process when it's safe and convenient.

RCM mapping allows drivers to easily scan custom icons to efficiently run addresses, provide one-tap updates, set pick-up locations and recover more units. Quickly create and store filters to drill your map down into what is important to your agency. Each asset recovery form captures condition information and photos that automatically creates a Condition Report that is submitted to the client.

With RCM, you can:
• Customize map icons (Pro)
• On-Hook collateral in one quick push of a button
• Streamlined Asset Recovery process for quick condition, photos, and personal property reporting
• View real-time case information and addresses
• Quickly search your map (Pro)
• Mark “Favorite” cases for quick access
• Filter cases to efficiently run addresses
• One-tap quick updates
• Auto generated geo-updates
• Work your To Do list to capture quick condition reports of recovered units

For help with RCM, our team is available 24/7. You can submit a request using Contact Us or through out website https://mbsicorp.com/contact/

creator: MBSi Corp.
descriptionHtml:
Equip your field agents with real-time repossession assignment information with RCM. Having case data at your fingertips helps agents mitigate risk by avoiding wrongful repossessions and quickly updating the status of the unit to On Hook. After marking On Hook, agents can go through the asset recovery process when it's safe and convenient.

RCM mapping allows drivers to easily scan custom icons to efficiently run addresses, provide one-tap updates, set pick-up locations and recover more units. Quickly create and store filters to drill your map down into what is important to your agency. Each asset recovery form captures condition information and photos that automatically creates a Condition Report that is submitted to the client.

With RCM, you can:
• Customize map icons (Pro)
• On-Hook collateral in one quick push of a button
• Streamlined Asset Recovery process for quick condition, photos, and personal property reporting
• View real-time case information and addresses
• Quickly search your map (Pro)
• Mark “Favorite” cases for quick access
• Filter cases to efficiently run addresses
• One-tap quick updates
• Auto generated geo-updates
• Work your To Do list to capture quick condition reports of recovered units

For help with RCM, our team is available 24/7. You can submit a request using Contact Us or through out website https://mbsicorp.com/contact/

Privacy Policy - https://mbsicorp.com/privacy/
Please note: REQUEST_INSTALL_PACKAGES permission is NOT included in this version 2.0.18
Latest Changes:
- Improved photo upload in RCM when you have poor service (read: less spinning).
- New Geo-Update: The new quick action geo-update captures the distance you are from the address you are updating with one-click.
- Other bug fixes and speed enhancements.

Quickly create and store filters to drill your map down into what is important to your agency. Each asset recovery form captures condition information and photos that automatically creates a Condition Report that is submitted to the client.

With RCM, you can:
• Customize map icons (Pro)
• On-Hook collateral in one quick push of a button
• Streamlined Asset Recovery process for quick condition, photos, and personal property reporting
• View real-time case information and addresses
• Quickly search your map (Pro)
• Mark “Favorite” cases for quick access
• Filter cases to efficiently run addresses
• One-tap quick updates
• Auto generated geo-updates
• Work your To Do list to capture quick condition reports of recovered units

For help with RCM, our team is available 24/7. You can submit a request using Contact Us or through out website https://mbsicorp.com/contact/

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Highlights of this Release:
Performance Enhancements: Enjoy faster load times, especially during initial app launch and navigation.
General Maintenance and Bug Fixes, including:
Marking invalid addresses more efficiently.
Fixing the client dropdown issue in the New Cases filter.
Resolving problems with opening case details from the To-Do List.
Thank you for using our app! As always, we’re committed to making your experience better with every update.
